hero.title: Welcome to Royal TV, the Ultimate IPTV Experience! üåüüëë
hero.subtitle: Watch over 20,000 premium TV stations from all around the world‚Äîright from your screen, wherever you are!
hero.blurb_line1: (That‚Äôs every major sports, movie, and entertainment channel‚Äîplus tons more you never knew you needed.)
hero.blurb_line2: All traffic is fully encrypted for your total peace of mind.
hero.blurb_line3: Enjoy Royal TV‚Äôs exclusive secure streaming, available day and night, every single day!

body.line1: Experience a new era of streaming with Royal TV!
body.line2: Dive into high-quality shows, blockbuster movies, non-stop kids programming, and the world‚Äôs top international channels.
body.line3: With our range of flexible packages, you get unbeatable variety,
body.body_tail: support, and deals you won‚Äôt find anywhere else‚Äîonly at Royal TV!
body.cta: Register now and unlock a universe of entertainment. Double the value, double the fun, double the satisfaction‚Äîguaranteed!

page.thank_you: Thank you for contacting us! We‚Äôll get back to you as soon as possible. ({countdown})
page.cta_button: Register Now & Claim Your FREE 1-Day Trial Access!

items.what_is_iptv_q: What is IPTV and how do I use it?
items.what_is_iptv_a: IPTV is a service that allows you to stream live TV through apps installed on your device. It‚Äôs supported on most modern devices including smart TVs, phones, and computers.
items.getting_started_a: It‚Äôs super easy! Just reach out to us and we‚Äôll guide you through everything ‚Äî including a free trial setup.
items.icelandic_channels_a: Yes, all channels from Iceland are available ‚Äî even sports channels ‚Äî so you can watch what you want anytime.
items.free_trial_q: Can I get a free trial?
items.free_trial_a: Yes, we offer free trials in most cases. Availability may vary depending on server capacity.
items.simultaneous_streams_q: How many people can watch at the same time?
items.simultaneous_streams_a: This depends on your subscription plan, but typically one device is allowed per account unless multi-stream is enabled.
items.requirements_q: What do I need to start watching?
items.requirements_a: All you need is a stable internet connection and a compatible device. We‚Äôll help you set up the rest.
items.special_equipment_a: No special equipment is required. Any device that supports IPTV apps ‚Äî like Smart TVs, Android boxes, or phones ‚Äî will work.
items.works_everywhere_a: Yes, you can use the service anywhere in the world as long as you have internet access.
items.channel_issue_q: What happens if a channel doesn‚Äôt work?
items.channel_issue_a: We monitor and update our streams constantly. If you notice an issue, contact support and we‚Äôll look into it right away.
items.refunds_a: Due to the nature of digital services, we don‚Äôt offer refunds. We always recommend starting with a free trial first.
items.renew_q: How do I renew my subscription?
items.renew_a: Renewing is easy ‚Äî just visit our website or contact support and we‚Äôll assist you with the process.
items.multi_device_q: Can I use the same account on multiple devices?
items.multi_device_a: Accounts are usually limited to one device unless your plan includes multi-device access. Contact us to upgrade.
items.stability_q: Is the service stable and reliable?
items.stability_a: Yes! We focus on delivering a smooth and reliable experience with minimal buffering and downtime.
items.channels_count_a: Approximately 12‚Äì14,000 channels are available from many countries, including premium channels.
items.apple_android_tv_q: Can I use it on Apple TV or Android TV?
items.apple_android_tv_a: Absolutely! Royal TV supports most major platforms including Apple TV, Android TV, Fire Stick, and more.
items.support_a: Yes, our support team is available via live chat, email, and other platforms to help you anytime you need.
items.commitment_a: The shortest plan is 6 months and the longest is 1 year. You pay a one-time fee for the selected period.
items.content_types_q: What kind of content do you offer?
items.content_types_a: Royal TV includes live TV channels, movies, series, sports, and more ‚Äî all in one place.
items.hd_4k_q: Can I watch in HD or 4K?
items.hd_4k_a: Yes, many of our channels and content support HD and even 4K streaming for the best quality.
items.slow_internet_q: Will it work on slow internet?
items.slow_internet_a: We recommend at least a 10 Mbps connection for the best experience, but adaptive quality helps lower connections too.
items.legal_q: Is it legal to use IPTV?
items.legal_a: We only provide services in compliance with applicable laws. Please ensure you use IPTV services legally in your region.

instructions.title: How to Pay with Bitcoin

steps.open_wallet: Open your Bitcoin wallet (phone or computer).
steps.copy_paste: Copy & paste the address and the exact Bitcoin amount shown below.
steps.double_check: Double-check all info, then tap Send.

instructions.wait_here: Please stay on this page and don‚Äôt close it until payment is 100% complete.
instructions.youll_get_confirmation: You‚Äôll get a confirmation notification and email as soon as payment is completed.
instructions.activated_when_complete: Your subscription is activated as soon as the payment completes fully.
instructions.qr_tip: Tip: You can also scan the QR code below with your wallet app‚Äîthis fills in everything automatically!
instructions.need_help: Need help? Message support in your dashboard anytime!

waiting.title: Waiting for payment to start...
waiting.desc: Scan the QR code or copy the address to send your Bitcoin payment. Remember to send the exact amount shown next to the QR code.
waiting.label: Waiting

pending.title: Payment pending...
pending.desc: Your payment is being processed. You don‚Äôt need to do anything ‚Äî this usually only takes a short time.
pending.label: Pending

sending.title: Payment has been sent from your wallet...
sending.label: Sending

confirming.title: Payment is confirming...
confirming.desc: It has been received and is waiting for enough confirmations. This usually takes a few minutes.
confirming.label: Confirming

completed.title: Payment confirmed / completed
completed.desc: Your subscription has been created and is now active. Welcome to Royal TV!
completed.label: Completed

failed.title: Payment failed or expired.
failed.desc: If you see ‚Äúexpired‚Äù or ‚Äúfailed‚Äù, please wait for the next confirmation attempt. This can take up to 1 hour and retries automatically.
failed.label: Failed
